Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries scored the equalizer on 83 minutes from a Gakpo free-kick
Virgil van Dijk was sent off after receiving two quick bookings

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands struck late to rescue a 1-1 draw against Hungary
